Package DAO

Class CustomerDAOImp

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustomerDAOImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAOImp extends Object implements CustomerDAO
CustomerDAOImp implement CustomerDAO interface CustomerDAOImp is the Data access object class that hold the data retrieved from database and display it with a observableList define the lambda expression 'toUTC' to convert local time to UTC time define the lambda expression 'toLocalTime' to convert UTC time to local time

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CustomerDAOImp()
    constructor for the class read all the rows of data from customers table from database and save it in the observableList use the defined lambda expression 'toLocalTime' to convert UTC time from database to local time
